Our design team worked with Alison to reproduce her original designs on sustainable fabrics that are easy to wash and wear. This dress is adapted from our best-selling, '90s-inspired slip skirt for a look that's just as sleek, not to mention versatile. Plus, it was crafted from our new cupro fabric, which is just as smooth as—and way more durable than—silk, machine washable and made from recycled cotton linter at a zero-waste facility.

It's bluesign® approved and crafted at a LEED®-certified facility whose manufacturing process uses less water and energy—and it's dyed without hazardous chemicals.

Based between New York and Lithuania, The Knotty Ones was founded by three best friends who set out to design the perfect knit while empowering less privileged women in their community. Romantic regrets? Let us tell you, you're not alone. But wearing your heart on your sleeves (literally) can be pretty therapeutic. It's the perfect polished-but-relaxed style that—bonus!—also covers your bum. By buying cotton products from J.Crew, you're supporting more responsibly grown cotton through the Better Cotton Initiative.

All the comfort of your favorite sweater, now in short form. This is an easy-yet-polished style that we're wearing everywhere—from at-home video calls to lazy-weekend beach trips. P.S. This style is also crafted with a touch of TENCEL™ lyocell (an eco-friendly fiber produced from wood pulp sourced from sustainably managed and certified forests—meaning not ancient or endangered!).

Our go-to hangout-slash-beach short for summer, crafted in our famous cotton-cashmere, which is lightweight, cushy and machine washable (!). Even better news: We made a matching hoodie in the same fabric, for the easiest, comfiest outfit ever.

Lightweight, cushy and machine washable(!), cotton-cashmere is perfect for lounging, coffee runs and pretty much anything else on the agenda. These easy-fitting shorts are made for all of the above, plus we made a matching sweatshirt, for the easiest outfit ever.By buying cotton products from J.Crew, you're supporting our investment in Better Cotton's mission to help cotton communities survive and thrive while protecting and restoring the environment. This product is sourced through a system of mass balance and therefore may not contain Better Cotton. These shorts were crafted at a Fair Trade Certified™ factory that provides additional income and better conditions for the people who work there.

We upgraded our cashmere collection with finer, loftier fibers to make the soft stuff, somehow, even softer. And because we like to make a lasting impression, our new cashmere is also more enduring than ever—in both quality and style. It's the season of sweater dressing, so we thought why not go head to toe? Meet our new cashmere sweats, with an easy, drapey fit and a cute drawstring waist. We're invested in bringing you the best in cashmere, so you can feel great about investing in it too.
Our confetti space-dyed cotton sweatshirt includes a rainbow of yarns creating perfectly imperfect patterns that recall the look of old school sweats (but with a colorful, modern twist).

Our soft blend of alpaca and merino wool is fuzzy with a hint of stretch, and never, ever itchy. This sweet sweater style is made from rich, multidimensional yarn and features a cropped silhouette, puff sleeves and a turtleneck for a touch of extra warmth.

This festive knit was born on the Shetland island of, you guessed it, Fair Isle, in northern Scotland. This tank style features intricate stitching in soft, neutral colors and pairs perfectly with the matching cardigan. We're proud to support responsible cashmere production through our partnership with the Aid by Trade Foundation (AbTF), a nonprofit that promotes sustainable agricultural development across the globe. As the foundation's first U.S. member, we source cashmere that is certified to the AbTF's The Good Cashmere Standard®, which ensures the welfare of the cashmere goats, protects natural resources and improves the working conditions of farmers and farmworkers in Inner Mongolia. Plus, this tank was crafted at a Fair Trade Certified™ factory that provides additional income and better conditions for the people who work there.

When it comes to can't-live-without wardrobe essentials, there's nothing like a wool turtleneck. This version is designed slightly shorter and a touch shrunken, so it hugs the body (but doesn't cling). Chances are you'll need multiples.
A superclassic style, in a polished, perfect-for-summer lightweight Modal blend.

Introducing our newest responsibly made tees, made from durable (and comfortable) seven-ounce cotton jersey that's grown, sewn and dyed entirely in the USA. We're proud to be the first brand to offer products using U.S. Trust Protocol cotton as part of our commitment to transparency and sustainability in our cotton-supply chain.

With a durable sole that provides traction on city streets

In other words? They're really comfortable. Lace them up for easy-going outdoor adventures and city streets alike.

Think of this fall-ready style that's covered in cute pom-poms as your "dressed-up" sweatshirt of the season.

item_name: Women's Sorel® After Hours™ lace-up faux-shearling boots

Plus, they were the first company to combine durable uppers and warm linings with waterproof rubber bottoms, which is totally genius, if you ask us. This pair captures all of that, with a comfortable wedge and silhouette that won't weight down the rest of your outfit.

As seen in our fall campaign... With a geniune wood sole, traditional stud detailing and a soft leaather upper, these clogs just might be the only shoes we want to wear come f Bonus: the convertible strap can be worn two ways—around the back of the heel for additional stability or over the top of the foot for slide-in ease. Please note, for the best fit we suggest ordering one half size larger than your usual size.

item_name: Women's Sperry® for J.Crew Shearwater buckle boots in black

A side zip makes it easy to get on (and off), and the rubber sole is finished with wave siping for unbeatable wet/dry traction. Sperry has been an American favorite since 1935 when Paul Sperry, inspired by his dog Prince's ability to run nimbly over ice and snow, used a penknife to cut into the outsole of a rubber sneaker.
Western-inspired ankle boots with easy pull-on tabs, a wear-all-day walkable height and classic welt detailing. We love them paired with dresses and midi skirts.

Adidas (named for its founder, Adolf "Adi" Dassler) has been making some of the world's greatest performance athletic shoes since 1949—and there are countless Adidas-wearing Olympic gold medalists to prove it. Oh, and an eponymous rap song, thanks to Run-DMC. The simple but ingenious designs with the signature three-stripe logo were quickly adopted by athletes, artists, breakers, cool kids and sneakerheads alike. Introduced in 1972 and still going strong, the Adilette is perfect post-workout or for just hanging poolside.

This Brooklyn-based shoe label teamed up with skilled Peruvian artisans to dream up a cozy collection of slippers crafted from supersoft alpaca fur that's ethically sourced and cruelty-free. These party sandals feature leather straps and a memory foam leather footbed that's extra-cushy.

item_name: Braided tassel thong sandals with toe ring

Simple, strappy, comfy...your search for the perfect summer sandal ends here.

Introducing Gretchen: Our new, ultra-walkable sandals with soft, padded footbed and the tiniest bit of a wedge at the heel. Sportier than a leather sandal, dressier (and way more walkable) than a pool slide, these cool, colorful sandals are extra-cushiony—ideal for errands and exploring alike.

KAYU is a California-based, female-run company that partners with women artisans in Southeast Asia to handmake their products using natural, sustainable materials and indigenous techniques passed down through generations. Our sandals are made out of top-grain, vegetable-tanned leather that is natural and chemical-free. Each pair is meticulously handcrafted by a family-owned workshop in Greece using traditional techniques. Over time, the leather will soften and develop a beautiful patina.

Launched in 2014 in Los Angeles, Intentionally Blank set out with the mission "to create the pieces that help you fill blanks in your personal style mantra." These of-the-moment sandals feature geometric details like a squared-off heel and toe and tube-shaped straps.

Founded in 2013 by four sisters, KAANAS is a family business that makes socially responsible products by marrying playful, feminine design with classic silhouettes. A beautiful open-toe upper with a geometric design make these sandals one of a kind.

description: Introducing Monrowe X J.Crew. We partnered with founder and Brooklyn-based designer, Dani Evans, on an exclusive collection of summer accessories with a free-spirited twist, inspired by her jazz-musician grandfather. Made in Italy, these ethereal sandals feature lace-up straps, ankle-ties and more decorative touches in multicolored leather.

item_name: J.Crew X Loeffler Randall® Starla ankle-wrap sandals
description: We're starry-eyed over these celestial-inspired wrap sandals from NYC's family-owned accessories brand Loeffler Randall. We love the gold and silver embellishments, plus the comfortable leather sole with a signature non-slip finish.

description: Introducing the Menorca sandal collection - a brand-new, more comfortable update to our customer-favorite Capri sandals. description: Introducing the Menorca sandal collection, our newest and comfiest sandals yet—with a super-cushy padded leather footbed. This pair features dimensional crisscross slide straps in soft metallic leather.

In metallic leather, these strappy sandals will add a serious kick to your warm-weather wardrobe. Ankle-wrap straps and a low heel make these as walkable as they are sweet. Wear them with everything from floaty dresses to mini skirts to jeans—you really can't go wrong.

Brand new this season and ready for all your dressy-ish events, this slingback is modern, minimal and every-so-slightly sexy. Bonus: She's made in Italy, and looks as good with raw-hem denim as she does with a party dress.

Talk about well-heeled... We're kind of obsessed with the gold, abstract heel that will catch the light with every step.
We gave a retro-inspired silhouette (the square-toe pump) some modern updates, like a cool angled block heel and leopard finish.

description: Have you met Odette? We took our best-selling twisted-knot sandal and dressed it up with a sleeker shape and a walkable, party-ready block heel. In classic black, they're perfect for warm-weather work days—or just a casual night out, paired with jeans and a polished top.

description: Drumroll, please... Introducing our first-ever sneaker (we took time to get these just right, and at a just-right price). These have a classic white leather upper and a supercushy supportive insole, plus a few details that make them totally unique—like a striped canvas tab at the heel. Bonus: Every pair comes with both white and glitter-covered laces so you can switch things up depending on your mood—or your outfit. (The minimalist design works with everything from off-duty sweats to summer dresses.)

item_name: SeaVees® for J.Crew Legend platform sneakers
description: SeaVees has been creating casual footwear inspired by the California coast since the 1960s. These iconic Legend sneakers were first designed in 1964, which means they're over 50 years old and still going strong. Even better: this version gives a little lift.

Superga is the iconic brand for sports and leisure footwear who were the first in Italy to use natural rubber vulcanization technology for the production of shoes, boots and sneakers. During the celebrations for the 150th anniversary of the reunification of Italy, Superga was acknowledged as "one of the 50 objects that made Italy," thus confirming its status as "the people's shoes of Italy." Forever iconic, forever new. The classic Superga 2750 sneakers are an Italian style staple and an authentic design piece. Born in 1925, when the young Turin entrepreneur Walter Martiny created a prototype of rubber-soled sports shoes for his tennis-loving wife, their appeal remains intact today. An ideal blank canvas for designers and artists to create unique and novel interpretations - they remain an enduring fashion favorite season after season.

Sweden's Tretorn sneakers (est. 1891) have been worn on and off tennis courts around the world. This retro-inspired style features colorful topstitching and a comfy, environmenally-friendly Eco-Ortholite® insole.

item_name: Unisex Koio Capri Perla canvas sneakers
description: Koio original low-top sneaker in lightweight, durable canvas. A canvas sneaker might be as classic as it gets. Koio's is constructed with as few seams as possible for an easy, wear-anywhere silhouette. Made by hand in the Marche region of Italy. Outfitted with outsoles by Margom renowned for their durable, lightweight rubber. Finished with hand-painted edges.

item_name: Women's New Balance® for J.Crew 520 sneakers
description: The classic New Balance sneakers from the 1970s, tweaked with a sleek fit that's also supermodern. Our design team worked with New Balance to create never-before-seen color combinations.

It's here: the original basketball-inspired silhouette, with a low-top profile and the iconic Nike swoosh (this one's metallic for an added dose of cool). Stylish and supercomfortable thanks to strategic padding and a cushioned footbed, these sneakers are a cool cross between athletic and street—and they're classic for a reason.

Made by—and for!—world explorers, Paravel has earned a cult following for its stylish, streamlined luggage, crafted from durable, yet lightweight fabrics. This duo includes two sizes of shoe cubes to organize and protect your footwear both in your closet and on the go. Created from the recycled plastic of seven water bottles, these nylon cubes are lightweight and easy to clean.
We updated our retro-inspired, block-heel sandals with a super comfortable twisted knot on top and mix of happy, preppy plaids. Stylish and supportive? Yes, please.

In casually frayed denim with a soft kid leather lining, these platform sandals feature a chunky stacked heel (so you can stay in 'em all day long). A collection of modern statement shoes that combine cool girl vibes with Italian craftsmanship, this shoe label was started by Puerto Rico-born, NYC-based designer Isa Tapia in 2012.

item_name: New Balance® for J.Crew Trinamic leggings in striped colorblock
description: We partnered with our friends at New Balance to bring you our first-ever collection of workout clothes—in techy fabrics and unique colors and prints. These full-length leggings feature flattering contoured seams and NB's Trinamic fabric, which absorbs sweat and has amazing stretch, comfort and breathability.
